name: Blown Away (Aetheris)
description:
Blown Away is a puzzle game where the player is not directly in the control of the character.  

Blown Away was created in 48 hours for the Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam 2020.

Controls:

  • A-D: Rotate the camera
  • Space: Toggles free moving camera (moves by dragging)
  • Left Click: Activates the wall panel the mouse is hovering over.
